post.body: I am adding profile page on ZeroTube.
What people of ZeroMe think of [GitTorrent](http://blog.printf.net/articles/2015/05/29/announcing-gittorrent-a-decentralized-github/) ?
You can now delete video on ZeroTube.

Update on ZeroTube : 
* You can access people profile
* Fix the search (now search correctly in description)
* Can't upload duplicate video on your channel but different people can have the same video on their channel

### ZeroTube Update 
You can now edit title and description of your videos.

I have fixed the router : [A Declaration of the Independence of Cyberspace by John Perry Barlow](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FUQPLXHimgCvYHH7v3bJXspJ7bMBUXcEb/?/watch/10/d59e6da0de8f5382f067e07375c262f15570a8f1)
Tonight I am going to try to create a ZeroNet website with the merger feature and I feel like it is going to be painfull. Wish me luck and see you on the other side.

Hello here,
I have done some update on the ZeroNet-React example (http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JfWHNDQeR71Uf8EtyRqCNJ1Ked5t1pukk/).
I just arrived in Koh Lanta. Anyone has been there before ?

I am thinking of splitting ZeroTube in channels. Each channel will be a hub and using merger site feature you would be able to follow/unfollow channel. It would work like ZeroMe. 

The advantage is that the database would be smaller (I know for now it is not a problem) and you could choose who would post in your channel. 

The issue is that the search feature would be less effective because you would not be able to search in channel that you don't follow. 

What people from zeronet thinks of it ?
Currently coding a torrent plugin for #zeronet at #ndhXV. Let's see what we will have in 10 hours.

I have made some nice progress on the Torrent plugin thingy, you can check the code here : https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin

It is still an experimentation but so far it looks good. The plugin can be tested here once installed : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL/

Just a reminder that you are not anonymous when using Torrent plugin.

## Good News Everyone

I have made some progress on the torrent plugin for ZeroNet. It now can stream videos/audio. I will publish the new example site soon.

There is still a lot to do though :
- Save and resume libtorrent session
- Torrent plugin UI
- Make it compatible with Webtorrent

The two first would be nice.

# News everyone

I published the updates of the torrent plugin. It now allows you to stream while downloading. Here the link to the github : https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin

Link to the example site : http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ChMNjXpW5vU5iXb9DSXzqAUfY46Pc2RTL/

Link to the example site github : https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-torrent-plugin-example

Have fun,

Hey everyone !

I just want to share an old project that allow you to keep your private key for your site on your ledger nano S. Unfortunately, it is not complete but I am hoping someone would be interested in this project.

https://github.com/rllola/nanos-zeronet-app
Trying to build libtorrent python bindings with conan. I am not entirely sure it is worth it...

I just discovered that live coding music is a thing and that there is a festival in Sheffield this week end ðŸ˜„

http://algomech.com/

comment.body: I don't know what is it... ?
@Megfault: The same thing that a simple goat but with headphones.
@Thekiller66: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1FUQPLXHimgCvYHH7v3bJXspJ7bMBUXcEb
@Kaffie: Yes, probably.
Hello Justgo.
@Kaffie: I have send you an email if you want we can keep talking on ZeroMail.
Dark ZeroMe ?
Hola
@Jayofthezero: Nice.
Also if you have issue uploading videos you can create an issue on the github or you can message me on ZeroMail.
Hello

@Sirenyc:  

>Video with .mkv extension does not handle the zerotube?
I don't know I never tried. 

>the side of the watch button could have an icon of the magnet link
That can be easily done.

>You can put the ZeroMe link in the profile Zerotube?
I will add a full description on the profile so it would be easy to add a link to your ZeroMe profile.

>Is there any way to put the caption option in the video? =D
So far I am only planning subtitles.
@Sirenyc: I have added a warning on the form. I will try to add a verification of the extension on the upload to avoid it. And sorry I did not get your second question...
@Truth: Thanks. Trying to improve it every day.
Email is linked to a gmail one. You should maybe change it for ZeroMail one. Example : `http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=lola`
Is it qute tho ?

Hi again @Nishita,
On the bottom of your post there is the disqus plugin which is not compatible with ZeroNet. In order to add comments you need to code your own integration.
@Nishita: Yes, I think it is a good example.
@Nofish: Thank you
I have actually been really lazy and have done almost nothing.

@ku4rt4m: It is a really simple example of a react application on ZeroNet. Might help some people to get started using their favourite framework. It has been also my first attempt to create a single application page using react.
@Arsene Lupin: https://github.com/rllola/zeronet-react Yep Sorry I was hoping to have time to write a better documentation before publishing it.
Welcome back ?

@Shellbound: The searchable index would be a good solution, it could probably be a new project. I will think about it.

And I am glad you like it. Still need to dig into webtorrent to understand how I can know when there is no peer so it would load more videos in the node automatically and the videos would keep showing. I have half a solution so far...
@Bingyuhuo: Should be ok now. I didn't have zeronet running so you couldn't download.

@Kaffie: Good point ;) I need to find someone with a OSX otherwise I think I will be able to handle linux/windows. Also it would be nice to have a plugins store @Nofish has mentioned it in the past but I am not sure for when it is planned ?

@P2P: I believe I can use conan to ship libtorrent dependency with it with the plugin and it will install it regardless of the OS you are using. I am not entirely sure how it works though. But I will try to make it a priority for this week so people can test the example.

@Synapse: There is a specific language for it : https://tidalcycles.org/
I think I will test it this week end.
@caryoscelus: Thanks a lot. It look pretty cool.
